= geomutils =

== 0011: 2008-09-08 ==

Download as [http://toxiclibs.googlecode.com/files/geomutils-0011.zip binary] or [http://toxiclibs.googlecode.com/files/geomutils-0011-src.zip source]

===Bug fixes:===

  * SimplexNoise now working in all 2D, 3D & 4D versions
